name: Multiple Sclerosis
description: Multiple sclerosis is a chronic autoimmune condition affecting the central nervous system. Infusion therapies can help manage symptoms and slow disease progression.
infusionApproach: IVIG and certain biologics help modulate the immune response to reduce MS flares and progression.

name: Crohn's Disease
description: Crohn's disease is a chronic inflammatory bowel condition. Biologic infusions target specific inflammatory pathways to achieve and maintain remission.
infusionApproach: Anti-TNF biologics and other targeted therapies delivered via infusion help control inflammation and promote mucosal healing.

name: Rheumatoid Arthritis
description: Rheumatoid arthritis is an autoimmune condition causing joint inflammation. Infusion therapies provide targeted treatment to reduce inflammation and prevent joint damage.
infusionApproach: Biologic DMARDs and IVIG therapy help suppress the autoimmune response and protect joint integrity.

name: Oncology Support
description: Oncology patients often require infusion support including immunotherapy, iron infusions for anemia, and other supportive therapies during cancer treatment.
infusionApproach: Immunotherapy and supportive infusions help combat cancer and manage treatment side effects like anemia.
